DOC.brief_summary: This three-arm study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of various dosing regimens of MMF combined with various dosing regimens of calcineurin inhibitor (CNI), either cyclosporine or tacrolimus, in participants who have undergone kidney transplantation. Participants will be randomized to one of three dosing regimens to receive concentration-controlled MMF with reduced CNI, concentration-controlled MMF with standard CNI, or fixed-dose MMF with standard CNI. Participants will be followed for 20-24 months after randomization.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Therapeutic Monitoring of Mycophenolate Mofetil (MMF/CellCept) After Kidney Transplantation
DOC.criteria: Males or females 1375 years of age Single organ recipient (kidney only) from living (related or unrelated) or cadaveric heartbeating donors Receiving first or second kidney transplant Immunosuppressive therapy (except for 48 hours prior to transplantation and corticosteroid treatment) within previous 28 days for a first transplant and 3 months for a second transplant History of malignancy in last 5 years (except successfully treated localized nonmelanoma skin cancer)
